overview:
French Internet pioneer, Christophe is now President of Auditia the Security and Network Architecture consulting company that he founded at Montreal (Quebec, Canada) in 2007.

He has a great interest in involving in start-ups as well as presenting conferences and seeking international short term training and consulting services contracts. For such a reason he is willing to travel on an intensive basis.

He holds CISA, CISSP and ISSMP professional certifications, and a Specialized Graduate Diploma (DESS) in Â« Governance, audit and IT security Â» at University of Sherbrooke where he teaches IT Governance (DAT823 course).
